resources.string: We need a few details to get your account ready

4.1. Company does not conduct background checks on users. You are responsible for verifying the identity and intentions of other users. \n4.2. You agree to follow safety guidelines and exercise caution when arranging to meet other users in person. \n4.3. You will not engage in any illegal, abusive, or harmful behaviour while using the App

5.1. By submitting content to the App (including text, photos, and other media), you grant the Company a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free licence to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, and display your content. \n5.2. You retain ownership of your content but agree not to submit content that infringes on any third-party rights.

6.1. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information. By using the App, you consent to our Privacy Policy. \n6.2. You are responsible for any information you share with other users and should exercise caution when sharing personal data.

7.1. Company reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violations of this Agreement or for any other reason. \n7.2. You can terminate your account at any time by following the instructions in the App.

8.1. The App is provided "as is" and without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. \n8.2. Company is not responsible for the accuracy, reliability, or suitability of user-generated content.

3.1. You agree to use the App solely for its intended purpose – connecting with other NITP students. Any commercial use or unauthorised access is strictly prohibited. \n3.2. You will not use the App to engage in harassment, hate speech, or any other behaviour that violates our Community Guidelines. \n3.3. You will not upload, share, or distribute inappropriate, offensive, or copyrighted content.

2.1. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.\n2.2. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during registration and promptly update any changes.\n2.3. You may not create multiple accounts or impersonate others.

1.1. You must be a part of NITP family to use the App. By accessing or using the App, you represent and warrant that you meet the eligibility requirements and that all information provided is accurate and truthful.

Hey, What would you like to learn today ?
Refer your friends and\n earn free course *
When you use our services, you\'re trusting us with your information. We Understand this is a big responsibility and we work hard to protect your information.
This Privacy Policy is meant to help you understand what information we collect, why we collect it, and how you can update, manage, your information.

- Personal Information: This includes your name, email address, photos, likings, unlikings, short bio and any information you choose to provide in your profile. \n- Usage Data: We collect data on how you interact with the app, such as your interactions, messages, and preferences. \n- Device Information: We don\'t take any information. - Location Information: We don\'t take any information.

- To Create and Manage Your Account: We use your personal information to set up and maintain your Friends app account. 
- Popularity Index: Your profile information helps us suggest potential matches based on your preferences. 
- Communication: We use your information to facilitate communication between you and other users. 
- Analytics: Your usage data helps us understand how our app is being used, enabling improvements. 
- Personalization: We use your data to personalize your experience on the app.

Like any other popular application, Friendship uses a lot of third party SDKs to provide many functionalities. 
*We do not explicitly provide any private information to any of these third party SDK. We have made sure that all the SDKs we use in our app are legally compliant with Privacy laws across the globe, including the new GDPR implemented in EU region. The sdks included in the application and links to their privacy policies are provided below: 

Firebase analytics by Google
- We implement security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access or disclosure.
- We may update this policy from time to time. Check the Last Updated date at the beginning of the policy.
By using Friendship, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Please review it carefully.
